definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
Zhiyi (538-597), founder of the Tiantai sect of Buddhism

sentences.english: The philosophy of perfect interfusion, put forward by Chih-i, the de-facto founder of Tiantai Sect, is the basis of Tiantai Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 天台智𫖮的圆融哲学思想体系是奠定天台佛学的基础。
